languages.text: "Ха. Думаю, в последнее время их число сильно поубавилось. Теперь ищут скрытых поборников старой веры".

traits.locale_text: "Ха. Думаю, в последнее время их число сильно поубавилось. Теперь ищут скрытых поборников старой веры".

languages.text: "Ha. I believe their numbers have been culled quite thoroughly of late. Now they hunt those who practise the old faith in secret."
languages.original_text: "Ха. Думаю, в последнее время их число сильно поубавилось. Теперь ищут скрытых поборников старой веры".

traits.locale_text: "Ha. I think their numbers have been significantly reduced recently. The ones wanted now are secret supporters of old beliefs."
"Ha. I think their numbers have been significantly reduced recently. The ones wanted now are secret supporters of old beliefs."
"Ha. I think their numbers have been significantly reduced lately. Now they're looking for secret supporters of the old beliefs."
"Ha. I think their numbers have been significantly reduced lately. Now they're looking for secret supporters of the old beliefs."
"Ha. I believe their numbers have been culled quite thoroughly of late. Now they hunt those who practise the old faith in secret."

languages.text: “哈，我相信他们的人数最近少了不少。如今，他们正在追捕那些坚持古老信仰的秘密结社。”
languages.original_text: "Ha. I believe their numbers have been culled quite thoroughly of late. Now they hunt those who practise the old faith in secret."

traits.locale_text: “哈，我相信他们的人数最近少了不少。如今，他们正在追捕那些坚持古老信仰的秘密结社。”

languages.text: « Ha. Sauf erreur de ma part, leurs rangs ont été décimés, ces derniers temps. À présent, ils pourchassent ceux qui pratiquent l'ancienne foi dans la clandestinité. »
languages.original_text: "Ha. I believe their numbers have been culled quite thoroughly of late. Now they hunt those who practise the old faith in secret."

traits.locale_text: « Ha. Sauf erreur de ma part, leurs rangs ont été décimés, ces derniers temps. À présent, ils pourchassent ceux qui pratiquent l'ancienne foi dans la clandestinité. »

languages.text: 「最近、彼らの数は徹底的に淘汰されているはずだ。今、彼らは密かに古い信仰を実践する者を狩っているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Ha. I believe their numbers have been culled quite thoroughly of late. Now they hunt those who practise the old faith in secret."

traits.locale_text: 「最近、彼らの数は徹底的に淘汰されているはずだ。今、彼らは密かに古い信仰を実践する者を狩っているのだ」

languages.text: «Ja. Creo que últimamente andan escasos de efectivos. Ahora persiguen a quienes practican la antigua fe en secreto».
languages.original_text: "Ha. I believe their numbers have been culled quite thoroughly of late. Now they hunt those who practise the old faith in secret."

traits.locale_text: «Ja. Creo que últimamente andan escasos de efectivos. Ahora persiguen a quienes practican la antigua fe en secreto».

languages.text: "Ha! Ich glaube, ihre Anzahl wurde in letzter Zeit beträchtlich verringert. Nun jagen sie jene, die den alten Glauben im Geheimen ausüben."
languages.original_text: "Ha. I believe their numbers have been culled quite thoroughly of late. Now they hunt those who practise the old faith in secret."

traits.locale_text: "Ha! Ich glaube, ihre Anzahl wurde in letzter Zeit beträchtlich verringert. Nun jagen sie jene, die den alten Glauben im Geheimen ausüben."

languages.text: "Ha! Son zamanlarda sayıları iyice azaldı. Şimdi de gizliden gizlide eski inanca mensup olanların peşindeler işte."
languages.original_text: "Ha. I believe their numbers have been culled quite thoroughly of late. Now they hunt those who practise the old faith in secret."
